mean_cn: n.妒忌；妒忌的对象；  v.嫉妒，羡慕
mean_en: the feeling of wanting to be in the same situation as somebody else; the feeling of wanting something that somebody else has
sentence: The little puppy envies the big dog who has a ball to play with.
sentence_trans: 小狗嫉妒那只有球可以玩的大狗。
word_etyma: en使 + vy=vid看到别人 → 妒忌
